name: remult-mono-repo
description: See projects/core for the remult core package.json. This package.json is used for remult/core development, test projects and experimental work. See

scripts.release-core: npm run build-core && npm run patch-versions
scripts.release-core-experimental: npm run build-core && npm run patch-versions-experimental && cd dist/remult && npm publish  --access public --tag exp
scripts.build-core: tsc -p projects/core/tsconfig.build.json && tsc -p projects/core/tsconfig.build.esm.json && copyfiles -u 2 projects/core/package.json dist/remult && copyfiles README.md dist/remult && copyfiles LICENSE dist/remult
scripts.all-servers: concurrently -k -n "koa,fastify,express,mw,deno-fresh,mwc,next,svelteKit,next-app" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgCyan.bold,bgYellow.bold" "ts-node-dev -P tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/koaServer.ts" "npm run fastify-server" "ts-node-dev -P tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/expressServer.ts" "ts-node-dev -P tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/middlewareServer.ts" "cd projects/test-servers/deno-fresh && deno task start" "ts-node-dev -P tsconfig.server.json projects/test-servers/node-servers/middlewareCore.ts" "cd projects/test-servers/next-server && npm run dev" "cd projects/test-servers/sveltekit-server && npm run dev" "cd projects/test-servers/next-app-server && npm run dev"
scripts.patch-versions-experimental: FOR /F %i in ('npm version prerelease -preid "exp" -m "release %s"') DO git push origin %i && npm run update-versions
scripts.patch-versions: FOR /F %i in ('npm version patch -m "release %s"') DO git push origin %i && npm run update-versions
scripts.detect-circular: depcruise projects/core --include-only "^projects/core" --output-type dot | dot -T svg > dependency-graph.svg
scripts.dc: depcruise projects/core --include-only "^projects/core" --output-to ./tmp/dependency-violations.html --output-type err-html | dot -T svg > dependency-graph.svg
